channel.title: Audio on Hugh's Curriculum Vitae
channel.description: Recent content in Audio on Hugh's Curriculum Vitae

item.title: General introduction to the Materiality of Audio objects in the study of linguistics
Archives not Participating in OLAC
item.description: Background of the paper OLAC is the Open Language Archive Community. This is a community of digital data collections which aggregate their holdings data to a common place so that linguists can view the data by a variety of parameters which are relevant to linguists. The two major parts of OLAC are the aggregator and a metadata standard. The metadata standard is OAI compliant and pairs well with Dublin Core.

item.title: Audio File Formats - A follow up to the SIL internal conversation on the Linguistics Discussion List
Audio Digitization
item.description: SIL Americas Area project to digitize analogue audio mediums.
